hero.whatIDoLong: I am a full-stack developer passionate about creating user-friendly digital solutions. My focus is on developing responsive and accessible web applications and constantly improving my skills.

about.aboutMeLong:
Hi! I am a junior Frontend Developer, born and raised in Alingsås. I am perceived as a positive guy who is eager to help and service-oriented.

I have no issues with new tasks. Rather, I am curious and motivated to develop my skills and learn new things. I enjoy collaborating but also have no problem working independently.

I like to be organized and meticulous with the tasks I receive. I have no issues being flexible and helping out where it is most needed.

kokokaka.title: Frontend Developer
kokokaka.description1: At Kokokaka, I had the opportunity to truly explore and develop my creative and technical side as a front-end developer with a focus on UX/UI.
kokokaka.description2: I worked with a variety of technologies, including HTML, CSS, React, WordPress, and even AR technologies. I also delved into Photoshop and Illustrator, which broadened my skills in both development and design.
kokokaka.description3: I had an independent role where I often had to solve problems and conduct research on my own, but I greatly appreciated the support and insights I received from my colleagues.
kokokaka.description4: This is how my supervisor described me: (translated to English)
kokokaka.quote: 'Simon is always very focused and dedicated to his work. When he encounters problems, he tries to find solutions using AI, forums, and tutorials. He is independent and meticulous.'
kokokaka.description5: I also received a very nice letter of recommendation from Kokokaka, which you can download above.

gymControl.title: Fullstack Developer
gymControl.description1: At Gym Control, I had the opportunity to further develop my skills in frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery, as well as integrations with various APIs and PHP with SQL as the backend.
gymControl.description2: At the end of my internship, I received very positive feedback from Johan: (translated from Swedish)
gymControl.quote: 'Simon is always on his toes and learns quickly, and he will be an asset to anyone who gets the chance to work with/hire him in the future. The best of all interns we have had in the company over the years.'

medieinstitutet.title: Studying Frontend
medieinstitutet.description1: During my education, I have continuously developed my technical skills and grown both personally and professionally. I have learned to create responsive and user-friendly websites as well as the ability to solve problems, collaborate effectively in teams, and communicate clearly. My skills will be invaluable in my future career.
medieinstitutet.description2: As I look ahead, I see many possible career paths. Comparing my current knowledge to what I had when I started the education fills me with a sense of pride. The education has been an invaluable part of my journey towards becoming a successful Front End Developer, and I look forward with excitement to what the future holds.
medieinstitutet.description3: At the end of my education, I received a positive message from my education leader, Johanna: (translated from Swedish)
medieinstitutet.quote: 'You're awesome and constantly impress! It's been so fun to follow you during the course of your education. I also feel that you have developed a lot during your internship, which is great to see. Keep believing in yourself and enter the job market with confidence.'

elpro.title: Electrician
elpro.description1: During my time at Elpro, I gained a deep understanding of industrial automation and developed my skills in electrical design. I worked as an electrical assembler, where I played a vital role in the production of advanced electrical control systems and cabinets.
elpro.description2: With the help of various drawings, I created customized solutions to meet the specific needs of customers. I handled both individual projects and serial production of control cabinets. My role involved building systems from scratch and ensuring that each project met high-quality standards.
elpro.description3: I have learned the importance of precision, efficiency, and continuous improvement.

netto.title: Store Clerk
netto.description1: After completing my high school education, I had the privilege of working as a retail salesperson at Netto, where I had the opportunity to develop skills in inventory management, cash handling, cleaning, maintenance, and customer service.
netto.description2: I learned the importance of effective communication, collaboration, and problem-solving, as well as how to manage demands and expectations from different customer groups.

contact.title: 04. What’s next?
contact.endingText: I'm seeking new opportunities. My inbox is always open, whether you have a question or just want to say hello, I'll do my best to get back to you!
